name: dweebui
description: DweebUI is a playful, customizable web dashboard for presenting information widgets, links, and status blocks. Itâ€™s designed for self-hosted homepages, homelabs, or personal start pages with a retro-inspired style.
features: Retro Dashboard: Playful, retro-inspired interface design with customizable themes and nostalgic styling elements.
Widget System: Create custom information widgets displaying system stats, weather, links, and personal content.
Link Management: Organize frequently used links and bookmarks with custom icons and categorization options.
Status Blocks: Display service status, system health, and custom metrics with color-coded visual indicators.
Customizable Layout: Drag-and-drop interface builder with flexible grid system and responsive design options.
Personal Homepage: Perfect for browser start pages, homelab dashboards, and personal information centers.
Theme Engine: Multiple built-in themes with support for custom CSS and color scheme modifications.
Quick Access: Fast loading times and keyboard shortcuts for efficient navigation and productivity.
Mobile Friendly: Responsive design that works seamlessly on smartphones, tablets, and desktop devices.
No Dependencies: Lightweight implementation with minimal external dependencies and fast deployment.
Configuration Files: Simple JSON-based configuration for easy setup and version control integration.
Privacy Focused: Self-hosted solution with no external tracking or data collection requirements.
